objects.text:
• Vintage-inspired twin-bell design
• Clear, easy-to-read analog display
• No-tick silent operation for sleep
EARLY BIRD OFFER - GET YOURS NOW!
Limited time offer! While stocks last.

product_details.name: Classic Mini Twin-Bell Alarm Clock - Retro Style Wake-Up Companion
product_details.description:
• Vintage-inspired twin-bell design in elegant white finish
• Clear, easy-to-read analog display with bold numbers
• Compact size perfect for nightstands and desks
• Traditional mechanical bell alarm system
• Durable metal construction with stylish matte finish
• Battery-operated for reliable timekeeping
• No-tick silent operation for peaceful sleep
• Ideal for light to medium sleepers
• Classic round face with modern minimalist design
• Perfect blend of retro charm and practical functionality

banner_details:
This banner showcases a sunrise-themed promotional design for a classic analog alarm clock. The background features a soft radial gradient transitioning from a light peach to a warm orange, evoking a dawn atmosphere. The left half of the banner is styled with gentle curved lines and orange tints, enhanced with circular accents to simulate early morning glow. It contains several text layers including a bold, playful heading (`heading`), a product title in clean sans-serif (`product_name`), a subheading (`tagline`), bullet-pointed features (`description`), an offer line (`offer_text`), a stylized price (`price`), a bold call-to-action (`cta_text`), and a small disclaimer (`disclaimer`). The right side of the banner prominently displays an image of the product (`product_image`) over a pale cream background.

**Color Palette:**
- Warm Orange: `#FF8C00`
- Soft Peach: `#FFD6A5`
- Light Cream: `#FFF8F0`
- Deep Gray: `#333333`
- Medium Gray: `#666666`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features a vintage-style alarm clock with a predominantly white color scheme, giving it a clean, minimalist, and timeless appeal. The body and bells of the clock are soft white (#F5F5F5), with subtle gray shadows (#B0B0B0) that provide depth and highlight the curves. The clock face is bright white (#FFFFFF), contrasted sharply with bold black (#000000) hour markers and hands, ensuring high readability. Steel blues (#BCC8D6) are delicately blended into the metallic parts reflecting light, adding a touch of sophistication. This monochromatic palette with muted accents is perfect for a stylish advertisement banner that emphasizes elegance and clarity.
